pullrequest.title: Serialize components based on ignition::msgs with the default serializer

content.raw: Yeah, that would be the "right" thing to do, but I was hoping not to break ABI so it would make it to Blueprint. Right now, SubT throws a warning when using quadcopters.  I guess other than that harmless warning, there's no pressing reason to get this into Blueprint, so I'll target this to Citadel and add a custom serializer instead.
content.html: Yeah, that would be the "right" thing to do, but I was hoping not to break ABI so it would make it to Blueprint. Right now, SubT throws a warning when using quadcopters. I guess other than that harmless warning, there's no pressing reason to get this into Blueprint, so I'll target this to Citadel and add a custom serializer instead.
